Class Base

java.lang.Object
base.Base
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attackable
public class Base extends Object implements Attackable
The base of the player for deploying Unit and setup Turret; if hp is 0 or less than 0, the game ends.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Base(int hp)
    Initializes the field according to the given parameter, sets turretCapacity to 1, and initializes Arraylist<> for TURRETS.

  • Constructor Details

    • Base

      public Base(int hp)
      Initializes the field according to the given parameter, sets turretCapacity to 1, and initializes Arraylist<> for TURRETS.
      Parameters:
      hp - Health of the base.

  • Method Details

    • addTurret

      public int addTurret(Turret turret)
      Adds new turret into TURRETS if TURRETS size is less than turretCapacity.
      Parameters:
      turret - The new turret to add into TURRETS list.
      Returns:
      TURRETS size minus by 1 if add successfully. Otherwise, return -1.

    • removeTurret

      public boolean removeTurret(Turret turret)
      Removes the turret from TURRETS list.
      Parameters:
      turret - The turret to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the turret was found and removed, and false otherwise.

    • getTurrets

      public List<Turret> getTurrets()
      Returns list of TURRETS.
      Returns:
      The TURRETS of the base as List<Turret>.

    • upgradeTurretCapacity

      public void upgradeTurretCapacity()
      Increase turretCapacity and capacityUpgrades by 1 if capacityUpgrades is less than 1 and turretCapacity is less than 2.

    • resetUpgrades

      public static void resetUpgrades()
      Sets capacityUpgrades to 0.

    • takeDamage

      public int takeDamage(int baseDamage)
      Reduce base's hp by damage from the calculation. Calculate by rounding baseDamage multiply by 0.75 + (0.5 * random double in range of 0.0 <= value < 1.0).
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Attackable
      Parameters:
      baseDamage - The damage that the base is received without further calculation.
      Returns:
      The acutal damage that is taking

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Check if base's hp is more than 0.
      Specified by:
      isAlive in interface Attackable
      Returns:
      true if hp is more than 0,false otherwise.

    • getHp

      public int getHp()
      Returns the hp of base.
      Returns:
      The hp of base as int.

    • getTurretCapacity

      public int getTurretCapacity()
      Returns turretCapacity of base.
      Returns:
      The turretCapacity of base as int.

    • setHp

      public void setHp(int hp)
      Sets the hp of the base. hp cannot be less than 0.
      Parameters:
      hp - The new hp for the base.

    • setTurretCapacity

      public void setTurretCapacity(int turretCapacity)
      Sets the turretCapacity of the base. It cannot be more than 2 and has to be at least 1.
      Parameters:
      turretCapacity -

    • getMaxHp

      public int getMaxHp()
      Returns the maxHp of the base.
      Returns:
      The maxHp of the base as int.

    • setMaxHp

      public void setMaxHp(int maxHp)
      Sets the maxHp of the base. It cannot be less than 0.
      Parameters:
      maxHp - The new maxHp for the base.

    • getCapacityUpgrades

      public static int getCapacityUpgrades()
      Returns capacityUpgrades of the base.
      Returns:
